turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like you to order me a drink from Starbucks please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: from which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at the Safeway in Tuscon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Blonde Double shot on ice please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and do you want a flavor in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Sugar free toffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh lets go for whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: refresh me on the sizes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is tall, grande and venti

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh heck lets go for the venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and do you want whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh why not, I am getting all the fattening stuff already.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, is there any thing else? Muffin, Breakfast sandwich, cookie?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No the drink will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok that blonde doubleshot on ice will be ready for pick up in 10 min at the safeway in Tuscon. Can you be there by then?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I sure can

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: `Your welcome.
